summary: 25 plus years of on air broadcast experience, 23 of which have been in the Phoenix Market. Phoenix Suns Television Play by play/National  Radio play by play for the Dallas Cowboys/Compass Media Networks. I have experience in both Radio & Television consisting of hosting Talk Shows to Play by Play as well as management.  I've covered everything from Super Bowls, NBA Finals, delivering the Play by Play on 3 National Championship College Football games and much more!!  In addition to the above I have also done the Phoenix Mercury(WNBA), Arizona Rattlers (AFL) & high school sports package for Cox TV as well as doing Voiceover work. Specialties: PLAY BY PLAYVOICEOVERSSHOW HOST (TV/RADIO)ENTREPRENEUR
